name: Stalin's 2 Year Birthday Bash!
description: Stalin's Basics is turning 2 years old! To celebrate all of your Favorite Characters Stalin, Lenin, Napoleon etc are celebrating with a party! We hoped that you could join us. But Beware of what you do, everything is all Mixed up and there is no way of knowing what is underneath the invisibility cloak  covering the item, and if you dont collect all 7 notebooks, the party will be cancelled and Stalin will catch you. We hope you enjoy playing this game.
